text:
Hey Mentees! *Welcome to our Visual Effects, Media & Creative Mentoring Programme!* Everyone will be signing in over the course of the next few days ready to be *introduced to your E-Mentors*. In the meantime, here's *an on boarding pack with conversation ideas and a career template* so be sure to check it out. 

If you haven’t completed your brief online training please RUN THROUGH IT as it gives some solid advice on getting the most out of your mentoring experience. 

*Feel free to include a personal picture and status on your profile too*, this is an informal and relaxed space :wink: 

 Otherwise, let us know if you have any questions here or via direct message :ok_hand::ok_hand:

Hey Mentees! *Welcome to our Visual Effects, Media & Creative Mentoring Programme!* Everyone will be signing in over the course of the next few days ready to be *introduced to your E-Mentors*. In the meantime, here's *an on boarding pack with conversation ideas and a career template* so be sure to check it out.

If you haven’t completed your brief online training please RUN THROUGH IT as it gives some solid advice on getting the most out of your mentoring experience.

*Feel free to include a personal picture and status on your profile too*, this is an informal and relaxed space :sunglasses:

Otherwise, let us know if you have any questions here or via direct message as we're happy to help :ok_hand::ok_hand:

:wave: Hey Mentees! :wave: 

*Welcome to our Visual Effects, Media & Creative Mentoring Programme!* 

@Everyone will be signing in over the course of the next few days and then we will be *introducing you to your E-Mentors*. In the meantime, here's *your on-boarding pack which includes ideas for conversation starters and a career plan you might want to work through with your E-Mentor*, so be sure to check it out.

*Feel free to include a personal picture and status on your profile too*, we want Prospela to be an informal and relaxed space :sunglasses:

Otherwise, let us know if you have any questions here in this channel or via direct message - we'll be in touch shortly:ok_hand::ok_hand:
